A

addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener) - Method in class nl.kuma.calculator.calculator.NumPad
This method is called when a PropertyChangeListener is added to the calculator.

B

backspace() - Method in class nl.kuma.calculator.calculator.NumPad
This method is called when the "Backspace" button is pressed and removes the last digit of input.

Controller - Class in nl.kuma.calculator.calculator
 
cReset() - Method in class nl.kuma.calculator.calculator.Controller
This method replaces the current instance of numPad with a fresh one to reset the values.

E

equals() - Method in class nl.kuma.calculator.calculator.Controller
This method parses relevant values to doubles and makes a calculation based on what currentOperator is set to.

G

getControllerInstance() - Static method in class nl.kuma.calculator.calculator.Controller
We only need one instance of controller to make the calculator work, and we also want calculatorButton to have access to the methods inside of controller, which is why it is turned into a singleton.

I

inputDigit(String) - Method in class nl.kuma.calculator.calculator.NumPad
This method is called when the user presses a button on the keyboard representing a digit or the ".".

NumPad() - Constructor for class nl.kuma.calculator.calculator.NumPad
 

R

reset() - Method in class nl.kuma.calculator.calculator.NumPad
This method is called from Controller's cReset() method. setCurrentValue() is used to reset currentValue in order to trigger the actionListener and update the textField.

S

selectOperator(String) - Method in class nl.kuma.calculator.calculator.Controller
This method sets currentOperator to the value of the operator button that was pressed.
setCurrentOperator(String) - Method in class nl.kuma.calculator.calculator.NumPad

setEqualsMemory(double) - Method in class nl.kuma.calculator.calculator.NumPad
 
setInput(String) - Method in class nl.kuma.calculator.calculator.NumPad
 

U

updateField(PropertyChangeEvent) - Method in class nl.kuma.calculator.gui.CalculatorTextField
The textField is updated whenever the listeners are triggered on setInput, setCurrentValue, inputDigit and backspace.

V

verifyMinus() - Method in class nl.kuma.calculator.calculator.Controller
This method checks if input is empty and if so sets the first digit of input to a "-" so you can calculate using negative numbers.
